```{r}
birthday <-function(){
  x<-Sys.Date()
  y<-as.Date("1998-06-29")
  print(paste("今天我出生多少天",x-y,"天"))
}
birthday()
```

```{r}
birthday <-function(){
  x<-as.Date("1967-11-06")
  y<-as.Date("1998-06-29")
  print(paste("我和我妈相差多少岁",y-x,"天"))
}
birthday()
```
